title: Gradient Thief 1.0.0.8 [h33t] [pmsyb]
description:
Gradient Thief 1.0.0.8            





Gradient Thief is a FREE gradient creator that lets you sample colors in images to create gradient swatches. Through this technique, it's possible to take a small image (eg, of a sunset) and sample the background colors to create a larger gradient swatch. By selectively sampling which colors you want in the gradient, it's possible to 'remove' foreground obstructions such as buildings and trees. 
Imports from JPG and BMP. Exports BMP

Images before and after Gradient Thief was used to sample existing images. Notice how the clouds in the first image don't appear in the second?



Installation:
Unzip gthief.zip
Note:The files do not go into a destination folder in the programs start menu.You will have to create a 
folder to put the 3 files in.to keep the clutter down.
Run setup.exe

Site: http://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/143574
